text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump The GOP is really bad at numbers. This is people returning to old jobs. Just wait, they will be out of work shortly with the new COVID19 spikes and new shut downs! But Trump isn't interested in COVID anymore...getting reelected is his only focus. People Are Dying! #TrumpResignNow
